channel.title: Gourmet on PYONKICHI BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Gourmet on PYONKICHI BLOG

item.title: Japanese traditional ryokan in Kyoto Toshiharu Ryokan
item.description: The ryokan I stayed at when I traveled to Kyoto was wonderful, so I’m introducing it! There is a “Zashiki-warashi” who is said to bring good luck to those who see it (good luck information)! ?
